# Directory Structure
```text
.
├── README.md
├── run.py
└── utils
    ├── data.py
    ├── __init__.py
    └── model.py

1 directory, 5 files
```

# Command Line Interface
```text
usage: run.py [-h] --hidden HIDDEN --epochs EPOCHS --lr LR --momentum MOMENTUM

optional arguments:
  -h, --help           show this help message and exit
  --hidden HIDDEN      FeedForward network Hidden Dimension
  --epochs EPOCHS      Training epochs size
  --lr LR              Learning rate of the FeedForward model
  --momentum MOMENTUM  momentum of the FeedForward network
usage: run.py [-h] --hidden HIDDEN --epochs EPOCHS --lr LR --momentum MOMENTUM
run.py: error: the following arguments are required: --hidden, --epochs, --lr, --momentum
```

# Install PyBrain to Build FeedForward network
```text
$ git clone git://github.com/pybrain/pybrain.git
$ python setup.py install
````

# Data
```text
features: SepalLength, SepalWidth, PetalLength, PetalWidth
```
```text
labels:Iris-setosa, Iris-versicolor, Iris-virginica
```

# Build and Train the 1-Layer FeedForward network
## Model Parameters

```text
hidden: FeedForward network Hidden Dimension
```
## BackpropTrainer Parameters
```text
learningrate: 0.01
```
```text
momentum: 0.05
```
```text
epochs: 100
```
## CLI
```shell
 python run.py --hidden 7 --epochs 100 --lr 0.05 --momentum 0.01
```
## Model

```text
FeedForwardNetwork-8
   Modules:
    [
        <BiasUnit 'bias'>, 
        <LinearLayer 'in'>, 
        <SigmoidLayer 'hidden0'>, 
        <SoftmaxLayer 'out'>]
   Connections:
    [
        <FullConnection 'FullConnection-4': 'hidden0' -> 'out'>,
        <FullConnection 'FullConnection-5': 'bias' -> 'out'>,
        <FullConnection 'FullConnection-6': 'bias' -> 'hidden0'>,
        <FullConnection 'FullConnection-7': 'in' -> 'hidden0'>
    ]

```
